===Etymology===
Japanese-coined (kokuji, [[国字]]).

{{Han compound|衣|alt1=衤|上|下|ls=ic}} – a full set of clothes 衣（衤） including both the top 上 and bottom 下. Underling word alternatively spelled as 上下.

Compare other kokuji [[峠]], [[垰]], [[𠱚]].
